Text:
Phenomenal!
I've only got a crappy, ancient cassette rip of Rock Ride, had thought it was only released on magnetic tape. Am looking forward hearing a clean copy.
Thanks for taking the time to digitize and share tis.
Ah man, Rock Ride isn't actually in this torrent. All the other songs are there, and they're excellent, clean rips. Guess I was right - Rock Ride only came as a bonus track on cassette.

I've torrented my copy of Rock Ride, if someone's come looking for it.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5212474
